insufficient_uncertainty.description: Failing to acknowledge the inherent uncertainty in financial forecasts
insufficient_uncertainty.impact: May lead users to misinterpret forecasts as more precise than they can be

oversimplification.description: Providing overly simplistic explanations for complex financial phenomena
oversimplification.impact: May cause users to underestimate system complexity and interconnections

normalcy_bias.description: Failing to account for extreme but plausible financial scenarios
normalcy_bias.impact: May leave users unprepared for tail risks and black swan events

temporal_limitation.description: Focusing on short-term dynamics while neglecting long-term structural factors
temporal_limitation.impact: May lead to short-sighted investment decisions that underperform over time

contextual_blindness.description: Failing to consider broader economic, geopolitical, or social factors
contextual_blindness.impact: May miss important external drivers of financial markets
